title: 278.06 OTHER STATUTES TO APPLY.
text: Sections 279.18, 279.19, 279.21, 279.23, and 279.25 shall apply in so far as they are applicable thereto, except as herein otherwise provided. References in those sections to "answers" shall be understood as referring to petitions, and references to the "delinquent list" or "list" as referring to the tax list filed with the county treasurer.
